review: This unit far exceeded my expectations. In conjunction with Amazon Prime it is an amazing deal.If I find that something I have chosen is not really of interest I just stop it and find something else.The only problem is I find myself watching something every night.
author: Van Go

review: Sometimes it just loses the sound, you have unplug it to correct the problem
author: belassimbo

review: Amazon could have added so many more futures that they decided to skip out on. No internet Browser? If you own many apps on your google account, you cannot use them through your amazon fire TV. You will have to rebuy them all. And only apps that amazon thinks are ok you can download. There isn't even a you tube app. There is one but it seemed like it only showed limited videos (My brother searched up Chill Trap Music 2015 and there were no results.) Amazon has set a very low standard in TV computer boxes.
author: Ira Savatgy

review: Right now. ..it works fine. .except no sound. I will keep playing with it but for now. ..it's a dust collector.
author: Los Dios

review: Limited internet availability in my area ....works great with netflix ... can not get prime movies to buffer
